net.hockeyapp.android.internal
Class UpdateInfoAdapter

java.lang.Object
  android.widget.BaseAdapter
      net.hockeyapp.android.internal.UpdateInfoAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter
public class UpdateInfoAdapter
extends android.widget.BaseAdapter

Description

Internal helper class. Provides views and data for the list views in UpdateActivity and UpdateFragment.
